name: Pharmacy
description: Unlocks the pharmacy. Boosts the effect of giving drugs at higher levels. Automates the distribution at max level.
detailedDescription: Gives the possibility to distribute drugs to the customers.
Improves the effect of the happiness boost from drugs by 5.
